actions.text: Amendment SA 340 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 79.

Amendment SA 340 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S2301-2303; text: CR S2302) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for legislation that requires financial regulators to conduct rigorous cost-benefit analyses on all proposed rules.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 340 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 79.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 340 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 79.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 340 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Shelby.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for legislation that requires financial regulators to conduct rigorous cost-benefit analyses on all proposed rules.
